parameters.name: DedicatedHostGroupId
parameters.description:
The dedicated cluster ID.

>  You must specify at least one of the **VpcId** and **DedicatedHostGroupId** parameters.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: 50. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the vSwitch belongs.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the vSwitch belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the virtual private type (VPC) to which the vSwitch belongs.

>  You must specify at least one of the **VpcId** and **DedicatedHostGroupId** parameters.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone to which the vSwitch belongs.
